oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Don’s Potato Chips opening in Nashville, Tennessee, 1961 June 16
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A scene related to the opening of the Don’s Potato Chips in Nashville, Tennessee with Mayor Ben West and others, June 16th, 1961. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: West, Ben, 1911-1974
